name: Flipper Hazard 3
description:
Flipper Hazard 3 is a sequel to Flipper Hazard 2 which brings completely new stages and levels into play!

Control 2 or even 4 pads to pass the levels and achieve their goals. Raise your score by hitting the score raising objects on your way. Watch over your pinballs so you don't run out of them.

Get into the hazard mode and solve all of the new levels!
